price: Na hii ndiyo Njia ya Mola wako Mlezi Iliyo nyooka. Tumezipambanua Aya kwa watu wanao kumbuka.
arabic: وَهَٰذَا صِرَٰطُ رَبِّكَ مُسۡتَقِيمٗاۗ قَدۡ فَصَّلۡنَا ٱلۡأٓيَٰتِ لِقَوۡمٖ يَذَّكَّرُونَ
footnotes: Na hii tuliyo ibainisha ndio Njia ya Haki Iliyo Nyooka. Nasi tumeipambanua na tumeiweka wazi kwa watu wote, na wala hawanufaiki kwayo ila wale ambao shani yao ni kukumbuka na kutaka hidaya.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: wahādhā ṣirāṭu rabbika mus'taqīman qad faṣṣalnā al-āyāti liqawmin yadhakkarūna
